The new TBook LIVE is here. 
This time, weâ€™re teaming up with Omnipay to dive into the new era - where the real world opportunities lie as traditional finance meets stablecoins.

Traditional banks are stepping into Stablecoin.
But what does that mean for you?
As the StableFi Layer for the Digital Workforce, TBook is teaming up with Omnipay to explore the future of money, Stablecoin and more opportunities.

Join us on Twitter with Simoun from Omnipay for a LIVE AMA packed with insights, strategies, and community Q&A.
